title: Kiss of a Demon King
description: For centuries, Rydstrom, fallen king of the Rage Demons, has fought to seize his crown, never relenting, until he is tricked into the lair of an enchantress. Sabine the Sorceress of Illusions has long accepted her fate - to seduce a demon king. Just when they begin to fall for each other, one will be forced to make the ultimate sacrifice.
author: Kresley Cole
